00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 #include "KviHeapObject.h"
00029 
00030 class KVILIB_API KviDataBuffer : public KviHeapObject
00031 {
00032 public:
00033         // uSize MUST be greater than 0
00034         // if data is non-zero, it MUST point to a buffer at least uSize bytes long
00035         // and the data is COPIED from that buffer!
00036         KviDataBuffer(int uSize,const unsigned char * data = 0);
00037         KviDataBuffer();
00038         ~KviDataBuffer();
00039 private:
00040         int m_uSize;
00041         unsigned char * m_pData;
00042 public:
00043         int size() const { return m_uSize; };
00044         unsigned char * data() const { return m_pData; };
00045         // uSize MUST be smaller or equal to size()
00046         // consumes data!
00047         void remove(int uSize);
00048         void clear(){ if(m_uSize > 0)remove(m_uSize); };
00049         // uSize MUST be greater than 0
00050         void resize(int uSize);
00051         void addSize(int uSize){ resize(m_uSize + uSize); };
00052         void append(const unsigned char * data,int uSize);
00053         void append(const KviDataBuffer &b){ append(b.data(),b.size()); };
00054         int find(unsigned char c);
00055         int find(const unsigned char * block,int uSize);
00056 };
00057 
00058 #endif //_KVI_DATABUFFER_H_
